text.div:
Claim Processing Codes

This value set includes a Claim Processing Outcome codes.

Copyright Statement: This is an example set.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/remittance-outcome defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
complete Processing CompleteThe processing has completed without errors
error ErrorOne or more erros have been detected in the Claim
partial Partial ProcessingNo errors have been detected in the Claim and some of the adjudication has been performed.

name: Claim Processing Codes
description: This value set includes a Claim Processing Outcome codes.

concept.definition: The processing has completed without errors
One or more erros have been detected in the Claim
No errors have been detected in the Claim and some of the adjudication has been performed.
